summary:
This mod simply turns Angelina Jolie from the AngeLydia mod into a standalone non replacer follower instead of replacing Lydia

This mod is now completely standalone, it no longer requires the files from the original mod, I got permission from Omega99jp to include his original files in this mod. Full credit goes to Omega99jp
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=red][size=3]##If you have a problem with this mod, check the FAQ section below before asking##[/size][/color][/b]

[b][size=4][color=yellow]***FULL CREDIT GOES TO Omega99jp for bringing Angelina Jolie into skyrim and allowing me to make this standalone version of her***[/color][/size][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26112/]AngeLydia -Lydia is reborn- by Omega99jp[/url]
Both the body meshes and textures of the UNP version are based on [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP female body by Dimon99 (Contains ADULT content)[/url] so credit goes to him as well
Both the body meshes and textures of the CBBE version were taken from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/]CBBE Big Bottom Edition by Caliente (Contains ADULT content)[/url] Full credit goes to her for allowing me to include her files
Special thanks to all those who endorsed, supported, provided useful feedback and to those who uploaded beautiful pictures!

[b]Special thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1297025/]Ivory_Soul[/url] for featuring the mod on his [url=http://binarymessiah.wordpress.com/2013/06/16/the-elder-scrolls-v-skyrim-mods-the-very-best-part-9-followers-part-2/]blog[/url][/b]


[b]#### My other mods ####[/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35521]Olivia Wilde - Housecarl Replacer[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24684]UNP Clothing Merchants[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34273]Namaofs Watchtower - A Player Home[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31375]Hearthfire Alternative Library[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29633]Olivia Wilde - Standalone Follower[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29635]Olivia Wilde - Nude Patches[/url] ADULT[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26611]Angelina Jolie - Nude Patches[/url] ADULT[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24894]Severus Jewelry Collection Merchant[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24559]SED7 Accessories and Piercings Merchant[/url] ADULT[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24421]Adult Toys Merchant - NSFW[/url] ADULT[/size][/b]



[b][size=2][color=yellow]###### Brief description ######[/color][/size][/b]
[b]This mod simply turns Angelina Jolie from the AngeLydia mod into a standalone follower instead of replacing Lydia, you can find her in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun, talk to her, make her a follower and you are done.[/b]

In v1.5
#Tried fixing an issue that may have caused both versions of Angelina to turn on you if you hit her by mistake during combat

In v1.4
#Updated Both Angelinas to v1.5 of the original AngeLydia mod, which gave her a closed mouth, realistic looking lips and adjustments to the eye lashes.

In v1.3
#The CBBE Angelina was renamed to Angelica
#The UNP Angelina was renamed to Angelika
#Her class is now Dual Wielder/Archer
#Has Medium to low level perks to compliment her new class
#Gave her a light blades armor (same stats as an Elven armor) which you can temper and improve for her if you have the Arcane Smithing perk
#The light blades helmet was made invisible so that it doesn't remove her hair and because it's ugly
#Levels up with you from level 5 to level 81
#Can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun and if you dismiss her she will go back there
#Change the CBBEv3.2 body texture to the optional "High" compressed texture by Caliente for an all around better performance
#The CBBE and UNP versions can be used together


[b][size=2][color=yellow]###### HOW TO INSTALL ######[/color][/size][/b]
[b][size=4][color=yellow] REQUIRES SKYRIM v1.9 [/color][/size][/b]
1- Download and install 1 of the main files, either CBBE or UNP
2- Activate Angelina Jolie.esp (or Angelina Jolie UNP.esp) in your mod manager or game launcher and play the game

[b]I made a nude patch for both CBBE and UNP v1.2 (works with v1.3, v1.4 and v1.5 as well), you can grab it from here
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26611]Angelina Jolie - Nude Patches (ADULT ONLY)[/url][/b]

[b][size=3]If you are upgrading from v1.4 to v1.5 I recommend that you make a clean save 1st, that means,
1- Take any items you have given her in game
2- Dismiss her
3- Save in a new slot
4- Exit the game
5- Uncheck the esp (Angelina Jolie.esp or Angelina Jolie UNP.esp)
6- Enter the game and load your last save, say yes on the warning
7- Make a new save in a new slot
8- Exit the game and uninstall the mod
9- Install v1.5 of your preferred body type and it's related patches
10- Recruit her again and enjoy the mod[/size][/b]

[b][size=2][color=yellow]###### Optional Files ######[/color][/size][/b]

Currently there are 2 optional file :-

[b]"Angelica CBBEv3.2 ApachiiSkyHair Patches v1.5"[/b] [b][color=yellow]ONLY USE IT WITH THE CBBE MAIN FILE V1.5[/color][/b]
AND
[b]"Angelika UNP ApachiiSkyHair Patches v1.5"[/b] [b][color=yellow]ONLY USE IT WITH THE UNP MAIN FILE V1.5[/color][/b]

Both archives contain 6 versions of Angelica/Angelika with different Apachii Hair styles, look at the pictures and pick 1 style then copy the files of the hair style you want and paste them in your SteamsteamappscommonSkyrimData folder, overwrite when asked

[b]YOU MUST have the ApachiiSkyHair mod installed 1st[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Grab it from here[/url]

Download this if you want to use ApachiiHair F3, F18, F34 or F35 or F38
ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_4_Full (or a higher version)

Download this if you want to use ApachiiHairHuman 09
ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_1 (or a higher version) which is in the optional files of the ApachiiSkyHair mod


[b][size=2][color=yellow]##### How to Uninstall #####[/color][/size][/b]
1- Take any items you have given Angelina then dismiss her
2- Save and close the game
3- Delete the mod or uninstall using whatever mod manager you like

If you have the UNP v1.1 version
DatameshesactorsLydia < delete this folder
DatameshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomAngelina Jolie.esp < delete this folder
DatatexturesactorsLydia < delete this folder
DatatexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintAngelina Jolie.esp < delete this folder
Data Angelina Jolie.esp < delete this file
4- Done

If you have the UNP v1.2, v1.3, v1.4 or v1.5
DatameshesactorscharacterAngelina Jolie UNP< delete this folder
DatameshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomAngelina Jolie UNP.esp < delete this folder
DatatexturesactorscharacterAngelina Jolie UNP < delete this folder
DatatexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintAngelina Jolie UNP.esp < delete this folder
DataAngelina Jolie UNP.esp < delete this file
4- Done

If you have the CBBE v1.2, v1.3, v1.4 or v1.5
DatameshesactorscharacterAngelina Jolie < delete this folder
DatameshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomAngelina Jolie.esp < delete this folder
DatatexturesactorscharacterAngelina Jolie < delete this folder
DatatexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintAngelina Jolie.esp < delete this folder
DataAngelina Jolie.esp < delete this file
4- Done


[b][color=red]#### FAQ ####[/color][/b]
[b]#1 I'm using the latest skyrim v1.9 but I loaded the mod and I couldn't find her in the specified location, what do I do?
Make sure you have installed the mod correctly, if everything looks fine, go in game, save, exit the game, start it again and load your last save, Angelica or (Angelika if you use the UNP version 1.3) should show up

#2 (Rare issue) I'm using UFO and when I try to recruit her, she says I already have a follower, what do I do?
Nothing I can do about it, you will have to wait for the UFO author to update his mod to the latest game version, either that or uninstall UFO and she should follow you.
Another suggestion would be to play around with the load order, that may fix it ..

#3 She appears naked/in her underwear when I meet her for the 1st time, fix that!
There is nothing that needs to be fixed here, it was intentional so that the users who want to use the nude patch could actually see her nude, if she had a default outfit, her body will be covered all the time. If you want her to wear the armor I gave her, talk to her, make her a follower, trade with her, take anything out of her inventory and give it back, she will now wear her items normally. Or make her a follower then enter any other cell (a door or something) on the other side she will be wearing her armor as normal.

#4 HELP, she keeps using a shield in close combat, what's up with that? I thought she was now a dual wielder!
She will always prefer to use a shield when there is 1 in her inventory, make sure you don't give her a shield and make sure she always has 2 1handed weapons in her inventory..

#5 I'm using the CBBEv3.2 version 1.2 and her body appears to be black, what do I do?
To fix this problem problem .. If you are using the CBBE3.2 version I recommend doing the following,

1- Go to this mod page
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
2- Go to Files tab
3- Scroll down to the optional files
4- Download CBBE v3-2 High Medium and Low resolution textures
5- Extract it on the desktop or something but not to the game files
4- Open the extracted folder, (pick a body texture quality that suits your pc, either High or Medium or Low) proceed to "Textures" > "Actors" > "Character" > "Female" and copy the 3 files inside "femalebody_1, femalebody_1_msn and femalebody_1_s
5- Go to your skyrim folder SteamsteamappscommonskyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterAngelina Jolie and paste them there, when it asks to overwrite say yes ..
6- Your black body problem should be fixed now, if it doesn't get fixed, try the texture files in the "Low" folder that you downloaded ...

#6 I want to marry her but no conversation options show up about marrying her (Interested in me?) what do I do?
Go to Riften and talk to Maramal (he will be either in the Temple of Mara or in the Bee and Barb inn) then ask him about how marriage works in skyrim, also acquire an Amulet of Mara and equip it, once that's done, any eligible spouse will start mentioning to you how amazing and awesome you are and how it's hard to believe you are not taken yet, the dialogue option for marrying them should show up now (Interested in me?)

#7 Make her a playable preset please!
Sadly, it's not as easy as it sounds and here is the reason why.. Angelina's face is custom and the headmesh (inside the facegeom folder) used by her was edited by hand (by Omega99jp) to make it look like Angelina , there is no way to replicate her custom face using the face morph sliders.. However there is a much more advanced way which is making a race with her as a preset for that new race, the only problem is that there is no way (AFAIK) to convert a follower headmesh to a race headmesh, the only solution around that is to rebuild her face from scratch on a race headmesh which would consume a lot of time and I personally lack the skill set to do it myself ..

#8 Where can I get the other npcs in your screenshots?
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15808]Migals Housecarl Beauties[/url]
And [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24900]Camilla you Whore[/url] -Contains ADULT Images-
[/b]


[b][color=yellow]#### CREDIT and PERMISSION####[/color][/b]
FULL CREDIT GOES TO Omega99jp and I got permission from him to include all his original files into my mod
Both the body meshes and textures are based on the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP female body by Dimon99[/url] so credit goes to him as well
Both the body meshes and textures of the CBBE version were taken from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/]CBBE Big Bottom Edition by Caliente (Warning: Contains ADULT content)[/url] Full credit goes to her for giving me permission to include her files

Changed her voice to be Female Sultry
Removed her default outfit (she will still have it in her inventory) which means she will revert to her underware when she isn\'t given something else to wear
Changed the file structure of the CBBE version
Changed the file structure of the UNP version

files.name: Angelica with the CBBEv3-2 Body v1-3
files.fileName: Angelica with the CBBEv3-2 Body v1-3-26437-1-3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
The CBBE Angelina was renamed to Angelica
The UNP Angelina was renamed to Angelika
Her class is now Dual Wielder/Archer
Has Medium to low level perks to compliment her new class
Gave her a light blades armor (same stats as an Elven armor) which you can temper and improve for her if you have the Arcane Smithing perk
Levels up with you from level 5 to level 81
Can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun and if you dismiss her she will go back there
The CBBE and UNP versions can be used together
Change the CBBEv3.2 body texture to the optional \"High\" compressed texture by Caliente for an all around better performance
The light blades helmet was made invisible so that it doesn\'t remove her hair and because it\'s ugly
